payload.content: Cybernetic (goal-directed) models from behavioral and cognitive science are a better fit for existing data and engineering endpoints in developmental biology and bioengineering than conventional open-loop emergence and complexity models.

content: Cybernetic (goal-directed) models from behavioral and cognitive science are a better fit for existing data and engineering endpoints in developmental biology and bioengineering than conventional open-loop emergence and complexity models.
